name: Hangry Chicken
description:
Hangry Chicken is a wacky colourful game figuring  Nugget, a magical familiar chicken who's just trying to get home to his master Dunkleberg. Using his powers, Nugget is able to throw eggs and teleport to where the egg lands.  With a journey so far ahead of Nugget, will he be able to get home in one piece or be served as someone else's dinner?

Inspired by games such as SirLovelot and art style inspired by Gris 

Meet the Team behind Hangry Chicken:

Elliot - Producer 

Patrick - Tech Lead

Brodie - Tech Lead

Woolin - Art Lead 

Louise - Design Lead / Marketing Lead
